Text: Good afternoon Don I am sending you this email because I was looking at the Enron job postings on the intranet I believe that I have a candidate that according to the job description for power trader hr real time would be a great match for Enron I am attaching the resume of Jason Vogler I am currently an analyst in the Generation Investments group within ENA I have know Jason for most of my life He is a very sharp individual and I believe that he is an excellent example of Enrons core values Please feel free to contact me with any questions that you might have regarding Jason or his resume Thank you very much for your time and consideration Chris Czuppon Enron North America Generation Investments

Good morning Barry I am attaching a copy of my updated resume I am looking forward to meeting with you to discuss any possible opportunities that you may have in your group I began the Analyst Program in July and have been working in Generation Investments under Carl Tricoli The experience has been tremendous thus far We discovered last week that our group is being restructured and I am forced to look for redeployment Thank you for time and consideration Chris Czuppon Enron North America Generation Investments
